thread.title: Miami Dolphins: Training camp always puts positive spin on ball
thread.title_full: Miami Dolphins: Training camp always puts positive spin on ball | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Dave George
title: Miami Dolphins: Training camp always puts positive spin on ball
text:
Everybody wants something to feel good about when the Miami Dolphins return to training camp, as they will later this week. It’s the same all over the league, with perky predictions of profound improvement from good teams and bad.
I’ll try to do my part here today to keep that summer sizzle going for Miami fans by pointing out some encouraging trends and downplaying the stuff that had everybody so depressed last December.
